mapper.sql: select id, device_code, mouse_code, experiment_id, behavior_type, behavior_value, confidence, timestamp, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark from t_behavior_data
mapper.select: select bd.id, bd.device_code, bd.mouse_code, bd.experiment_id, bd.behavior_type, bd.behavior_value, bd.confidence, bd.timestamp, bd.create_by, bd.create_time, bd.update_by, bd.update_time, bd.remark, d.device_name, m.mouse_name, e.experiment_name, u1.user_name as createByName, u2.user_name as updateByName from t_behavior_data bd left join t_device d on bd.device_code = d.device_code left join t_mouse m on bd.mouse_code = m.mouse_code left join t_experiment e on bd.experiment_id = e.id left join sys_user u1 on bd.create_by = u1.user_name left join sys_user u2 on bd.update_by = u2.user_name where bd.id = #{id}
mapper.insert:
insert into t_behavior_data
device_code, mouse_code, experiment_id, behavior_type, behavior_value, confidence, timestamp, create_by, remark, create_time
#{deviceCode}, #{mouseCode}, #{experimentId}, #{behaviorType}, #{behaviorValue}, #{confidence}, #{timestamp}, #{createBy}, #{remark}, sysdate()
mapper.delete:
delete from t_behavior_data where id in
#{id}
mapper.select: select bd.id, bd.device_code, bd.mouse_code, bd.experiment_id, bd.behavior_type, bd.behavior_value, bd.confidence, bd.timestamp, bd.create_by, bd.create_time, bd.update_by, bd.update_time, bd.remark, d.device_name, m.mouse_name, e.experiment_name, u1.user_name as createByName, u2.user_name as updateByName from t_behavior_data bd left join t_device d on bd.device_code = d.device_code left join t_mouse m on bd.mouse_code = m.mouse_code left join t_experiment e on bd.experiment_id = e.id left join sys_user u1 on bd.create_by = u1.user_name left join sys_user u2 on bd.update_by = u2.user_name where bd.mouse_code = #{mouseCode} order by bd.timestamp desc
